properties.areaDesc: Vermillion, IN; Warren, IN; Fountain, IN; Tippecanoe, IN; Parke, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 8:18PM EST until January 22 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

Wabash River...White River...


.Minor flooding continues in western and southern Indiana on the
Wabash and White Rivers.  Moderate flooding is ongoing at
Mount Carmel.  Primary crests are comparable to those that occurred
in February and June of 2019.

Flooding has ended along the East Fork White River.  Flooding along
the lower portions of the White and Wabash Rivers will conclude
by January 28 based on current projections.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Lafayette.
* until Wednesday afternoon.
* At 7:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 11.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by late
tonight.
* At 11.0 feet...Flooding of low agricultural land begins in western
part of Tippecanoe County.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
